nodes.text: On the question of Iraq the hon. Gentleman gave a selective interpretation of what the UN Secretary-General said.
The best explanation of the fact that UN Secretary's declaration was interepreted as saying that the war was illegal is that the opponent made a selective quotation
The war in Iraq was legal

authority to use force against Iraq derived from the combined effect of UN resolutions 678 687 and 1441 all of which were adopted under chapter VII of the UN charter which allows the use of force for the express purpose of restoring international peace and security
If the case falls under the UN resolutions it is legal
